name: Fruit Flavors Lemon Extract (23-0055-NA)
description: Nactarome Lemon Extract (23-0055-NA) is a high-quality natural flavoring ingredient that is water soluble and perfect for enhancing the lemon flavor in your food products. It is allergen-free, halal, kosher and sustainably produced making it a versatile ingredient for various food applications, including syrups.
